ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve seen it advertised from as low as 10pp to 100pp.  The big difference between the dirk and other special weapons is that the mob who carries it spawns
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 16 Jun 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> Was curious what these are going for around Norrath as I acquired one from

I've seen it advertised from as low as 10pp to 100pp. The big
difference between the dirk and other special weapons is that
the mob who carries it spawns often, and has it every time.
It is going to cause a serious realignment of prices for
weapons in the L15-25 range. I personally wouldn't pay more
than about 15pp for one, maybe 20pp if I were in Qeynos and
needed another ASAP. Any more than that and it'd be more cost
effective for my friends and me to trek to Crushbone and get
another.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
